Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    The Team class is used to store name, ranking, red card score,yellow card score, total win times,total lost times total drawn times and a collection of players. And also initialize collection of players,test if players' name are same,display team result.
    Version:
    (20/5/2018)
    Author:
    (Pan Qi)

        Constructor for objects of class Team
        Parameters:
        String - which is the name of team.
        Integer - which is the rank of the name.
        Integer - which is the yellow card number of team.
        Integer - which is the red card numebr of team.
        ArrayList - whih is the collection of players of the team.
        Integer - which is the total win times of the team in all games.
        Integer - which is the total lost times of the team in all games.
        Integer - which is the total drawn times of the team in all games.
